docs.text: linkml-tutorial My first LinkML schema URI: https://w3id.org/tejasram365/linkml-tutorial Name: linkml-tutorial Classes Class Description Animal Class for animals AnimalCollection A collection of Animals NamedThing The most generic type of entity that has a name Person Class for Person PersonCollection A collection of Persons Slots Slot Description age_in_years Number of years since birth animals A collection of animals birth_date Date on which a person is born breed The breed of an animal color The color of an animal entries A collection of things id A unique identifier for a person name A human-readable name for a person pets a collection of animals that lives with and is taken care of by a person primary_email The main email address of a person species The species of an animal vital_status living or dead status weight_in_mgs The weight of an animal in milligrams Enumerations Enumeration Description Breeds Any breed from the VBO PersonStatus Range of the Status is being taken from existing ontology Types Type Description xsd:boolean A binary (true or false) value xsd:string a compact URI xsd:date a date (year, month and day) in an idealized calendar linkml:DateOrDatetime Either a date or a datetime xsd:dateTime The combination of a date and time xsd:decimal A real number with arbitrary precision that conforms to the xsd:decimal speci... xsd:double A real number that conforms to the xsd:double specification xsd:float A real number that conforms to the xsd:float specification xsd:integer An integer xsd:string Prefix part of CURIE shex:nonLiteral A URI, CURIE or BNODE that represents a node in a model shex:iri A URI or CURIE that represents an object in the model xsd:string A character string xsd:dateTime A time object represents a (local) time of day, independent of any particular... xsd:anyURI a complete URI xsd:anyURI a URI or a CURIE Subsets Subset Description
